text: Document existing urban tree canopy coverage without implementing protection measures.
name: p1

text: Mandate water recycling systems in all municipal buildings larger than 10,000 square feet.
name: p2

text: Offer 30% matching funds for private property climate resilience improvements.
name: p3

text: Mandate mixed-use development with minimum 30 units per acre in all growth centers.
name: p4

text: Record total waste volumes collected without implementing any reduction measures.
name: p5

text: Install solar panels on 50% of suitable municipal rooftops within 4 years.
name: p6

text: Record business sector emissions data without implementing any reduction incentives or requirements.
name: p7

text: Install smart water meters with leak detection in all municipal facilities within 2 years.
name: p8

text: Maintain current mix of development patterns with equal treatment of all densities.
name: p9

text: Allow optional energy efficiency upgrades only during already planned renovations.
name: p10

text: Cap emergency response planning at current levels with explicit exclusion of climate-related scenario training.
name: p11

text: Mandate commercial properties to achieve 60% waste diversion with phased implementation over 3 years.
name: p12

text: Allow optional preservation of mature trees during development if not conflicting with construction.

name: p14

text: Cap recycling program funding at 10% of waste management budget regardless of diversion potential.
name: p16

text: Consider both energy efficiency and traditional cost metrics equally in building decisions.
name: p17

name: p18

name: p19

text: Maintain current waste collection systems with equal promotion of recycling and disposal options.
name: p20

name: p22

text: Install interpretive signage about ecosystem services in major natural areas.

text: Create a public dashboard showing real-time municipal renewable energy generation.
name: p28

text: Install flood monitoring systems in major waterways without adaptation planning.
name: p29

text: Allow optional clustering of development only when specifically requested by developers.
name: p30

text: Record basic energy usage in municipal buildings annually with no requirement to act on findings.

text: Create public recognition program for businesses achieving voluntary sustainability targets.

text: Conduct basic climate vulnerability assessments with voluntary adaptation guidelines.
name: p33

text: Install sidewalks in main commercial areas without comprehensive pedestrian network planning.

text: Conduct basic waste audits annually with voluntary reduction suggestions for departments.

text: Consider both renewable and conventional energy sources equally in procurement decisions.
